website_summaries.verdict: A compact and affordable ice pack from a well-known brand in a convenient size.
pros: Customers like that this smaller-sized ice pack is lightweight, well-made, and doesn't leak
We love that it's easy to clean and comes at a low cost per pack
cons: Some felt the plastic was too thin and because of it's smaller size may not cool for very long time periods

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: These are not the size listed, unless I’m really bad at taking measurements. They’re not as thick as I needed. They’ll work in my husbands lunches just for a day, but I needed something that would last 10-12 hours for an insulin storage situation we had. It proved very difficult to find the thick royal blue ice packs in the right size. We switched out ice packs every 6 hours, so our cat’s insulin stayed safe, but it was annoying to order these and have them so slim.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3  Leak
customer_reviews.text: You would think that a name brand like rubbermaid would hold up. I bought a 3 pack of these less than a month ago. I liked the size because it would fit in a small medical bag to hold insulin. Well less than a month and they are already leaking I have them inside of a ziploc bag to prevent them from destroying my medical case but I will have to look for a different product I would suggest that these are not good for lunches because whatever chemical is inside of them will destroy your food content
customer_reviews.author: Margarette

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and does not keep items cold
customer_reviews.text: I put these ice packs in the freezer as soon as I got them. I took them out for the first time this morning to keep my green smoothies cold enroute to work, and one of the ice packs was leaking!!! I used the two non damaged ones in my little insulated lunch sack and my smoothies are barely cool, let alone cold!!! This was a horrible purchase and the LunchBox Blue Ice Small Ice Packs are a horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Avaya

customer_reviews.title: Good "little" ice packs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my lunch box . They seem of good quality but when they said small , they meant it . I can lay four across the bottom of my lunch box .
customer_reviews.author: pro gun joe

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold long.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great to keep my lunch cold for hours. If I pull out yogurt from my bag any more than 2 hours later the yogurt cup doesn't even feel chilled. Size is great, easy to clean just feel like they should stay colder much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: I love these cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these cute, reusable, and washable ice cubes. I usually bring my own lunch to work, and these ice packs work very well for me. They can even keep my yogurt good until lunchtime. Also, these are easy to be washed, stacked, and stored in the freezer for the next use. I prefer these to other bigger ice packs because I have a small-sized lunch bag that these ice packs can nicely fit into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very small read size
customer_reviews.text: The picture of plastic containers on the ice packs is deceiving. They are very small I did not read the size, my fault. Barely bigger than the palm of my hand. Actually though, since I have had them I have used quite a bit. I still need bigger ones but have found the small ones work really well for short periods of time and not so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cool very long
customer_reviews.text: Small size is nice for lunch box or something small. The problem is they're thin so doesn't have much liquid inside. Thus, doesn't stay cool very long. Even if you use two, I found one thicker one that I have the same size stays cooler than these.
customer_reviews.author: DWK

customer_reviews.title: Only stay cold for 2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they stayed frozen a bit longer. There is more plastic to these than inner water or gel. Still good for pre-k but wouldn’t last until a normal Full day lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for our needs
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my wife. She wanted them to use in a homemade bag to carry her diabetic supplies. While I cant comment on how long they stay frozen and keep her injectibles cool, or whether they sweat or not (as we have not used them) they are the PERFECT size for her needs!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Langva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to slip into a lunch box
customer_reviews.text: It will keep your sandwich cool until lunch. Small size, doesn't take up much room. solid construction. It hasn't leaked through several freeze-thaw cycles.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Love Rubbermaid Lunchblox System
customer_reviews.text: Always love Lunchblox products. Purchased these to add to my LB packs. Great for when you just need to cool some containers or to stack between containers if you pack a lot.
customer_reviews.author: artMom

customer_reviews.title: Good part of the lunch kit
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep my daughters school lunches cool. They perform just as they should and keep her food at safes temperatures. When combined with Rubbermaid's other lunch box containers, these become more useful and convenient due to the way they lock together.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: These ice packs work well for my daughter's lunch box. They keep her food cold until lunch and are still cold after she returns from school.
customer_reviews.author: stuckma

customer_reviews.title: Leaking on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have the lunchblox set up and have a much bigger ice pack, that is too big for my daughter's lunch box. I got these little ones to have a more modular set up and lock the lunchblox containers in place. Unfortunately, one was already leaking on arrival. For the price, this is totally unacceptable. Most ice blocks are only $1 and don't leak. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: These are cold blocks for a lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Good price. One of the three leaks blue fluid as it warms up. I can use it but must put it inside a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Snuzin

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than I thought when they arrived, not sure if I read dimensions wrong, but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my daughter's lunch bag. They are slim and dont take up a ton of space in the bag or freezer. Her food stays cold until lunch. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DClark

customer_reviews.title: Two out three leak so far
customer_reviews.text: One ice pack arrived leaking and a week later number two started leaking after a few uses. So two out of three are bad so far. Very poor quality. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed R69

customer_reviews.title: great person to work with
customer_reviews.text: the picture makes this look like its larger than it actually is, but its great for my lunch bag
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lunh cold on summer days
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my lunch box, keeps things cold without taking up to much space.
customer_reviews.author: buzzy ,

customer_reviews.title: 2 outta three
customer_reviews.text: One had a leak and had to be thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now just used them as useless freezer shelf adornments
customer_reviews.text: These are just not for me. I really should have researched this before I bought it, because they really are meant to be used with the rubbermaid containers they were made for. I now just used them as useless freezer shelf adornments. Maybe I'll buy the containers and see if they really work.
customer_reviews.author: DS702

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cat
customer_reviews.text: This keeps your food cooler than the other side of the pillow. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay frozen very long.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay frozen very long. I’ve found that by noon, they’re typically completely melted. I’m not in a hot climate either.. I’m mostly always couped up on the office. There are other brands that stet frozen longer if that’s what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I use three in each lunchbox to keep sandwiches cold. And the go through our dishwasher fine. We don't have a heating element but I use the sanitize cycle and they do fine!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Small size fits into just about any lunch pail or cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Mer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the lunchbox that I purchased. Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Very small but they do the job. I guess I should read the dimensions next time. I could have used biggger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than I realized but they work very ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I realized but they work very well. Because they are so small they freeze quickly but also thaw quickly.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: They fit just perfect and kept the milk cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my sons small insulated bag for his bottles. They fit just perfect and kept the milk cold for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my medicines cold when travelling
customer_reviews.text: I have medicine that needs to be kept cool. The Rubbermaid LunchBox Sandwich kit, plus the Rubbermaid carries and test cold packs, make a great travel accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Country Doc

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. Works very well. I work ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Works very well. I work 10 hour shifts and it keeps my food cold! Fast shipping and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays very cold. We use with the LunchBlox kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays very cold. We use with the LunchBlox kit and lunch box. They stay cold all day! This addition makes the overall lunch box packing very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: home alone

customer_reviews.title: These are thin but they stay cold ALL day. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are thin but they stay cold ALL day. My son's lunch is packed at 7:15 and its still cold at 3:30. Does not weigh his lunch bag down.
customer_reviews.author: STT

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty small but still great for lunch boxes
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty small but still great for lunch boxes. I generally throw in two at once. They stay frozen through lunch,
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food cool.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my toddler lunch box and hold up until lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon B.

customer_reviews.title: Good little ice blocks.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice backups for my LunchBox. They freeze fast, and keep frozen 1/2 a day.
customer_reviews.author: Zenginner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not last long even I put it in my lunch boxes. Only about 5-6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good size for coolers,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so have more freedom on how I pack my cooler for work. Have larger size; these just leave more room for drinks/waters and fruit.
customer_reviews.author: True single

customer_reviews.title: Small and dont stay cold long
customer_reviews.text: They are very small and dont keep things cold for very long. Can find bigger ones cheaper in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. It cools but not as long as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: These are fine- stay cold all day. I only ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fine- stay cold all day. I only wish they would fit more securely to the container lids so that they would slide around as much.
customer_reviews.author: Alex&Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but these don't stay cold as long as others we have. Wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mysterywriter6

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One out of three had leaked in the box before arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected, fits in smaller places and under things to keep things cool all around.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Very compact in size.
customer_reviews.text: These are very small so they do not stay cold very long but very convenient for short periods!!!
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Vila

customer_reviews.title: Cold all day long
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my lunch and dinner cold all day long. I use 4-5 in each lunch tote and their small enough to tuck between the sodas and don't weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect for my daughter’s lunch box. It doesn’t leak and stays cold.
customer_reviews.author: Mabono

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SIZS
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these. Use this for my Baby bottles to stick into my purse. Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree' Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Blue freezer stain
customer_reviews.text: I love the size- they fit nicely in my breast pump cooler but I used them twice and noticed blue ooze in my freezer underneath one - the inside leaks out after defrosted and refrozen
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving product description
customer_reviews.text: This product description was inaccurate. It clearly states a pack of three. What I actually received was one ice pack taken out of a pack of three. I would not have bought this if I'd known it was only one ice pack. Deceiving description; will not buy again and will give poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after one week
customer_reviews.text: I have had these about a week and only used one. One is already leaking from the seam along the side
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Snap on
customer_reviews.text: Work great snap on to my containers and keep my food cold all day
customer_reviews.author: Robin Mott

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Easy yo put it lunch box, easy to carry to places
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great product so far. Fits nicely in kids lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Deshippy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine - just didn't realize how small they were !
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: too small to stay cold
customer_reviews.text: too small.. doesn't stay cold in the lunchbox past lunch.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dean

customer_reviews.title: These ice packs are the perfect size for a lunch cooler
customer_reviews.text: These ice packs are the perfect size for a lunch cooler, but unfortunately one of them starting leaking after a week. The other two just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for packing lunches and keeping them cold! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, but not for warm to hot days.
customer_reviews.text: They are OK for mild to cold temperatures. They don't stay cold very long.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: These have served me well
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They fit the system and are at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my lunch box! These interlocking lunch containers are a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: These are very small - too small for a child's lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: mich-ca

customer_reviews.title: Very small and thin.  Best used for designated kits
customer_reviews.text: Far smaller than expected. Listing indicates the dimensions are 2.31 x 2.88 x 4.75 in. I incorrectly believed that this was the dimension per ice pack rather than for the box that they come in. Since there are three ice packs, you can see that these are less than an inch thick, about the length and width of a deck of cards. Even with three of these placed into an insulated lunch bag, they fail to keep even a single small sandwich cool for 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donovan III

customer_reviews.title: Great size for cooling smaller spaces! Great to have Extras!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lunch mate products. I was thrilled to be able to buy the smaller sized ice bloc as these are really handy. They fit in smaller spaces to keep drinks cold or other things. My son likes that the lunch mates fit so well together. Neat and easy fit together pieces that are almost like opening a puzzle. These are just cool! No pun intended! Great to be able to purchase extras. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: C.lC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Icepack for my lunch tote
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 pack to use in my every day lunch tote/insulated bag to take to work with me. I use two at a time on the bottom of the bag and put my lunch and snacks on top of them in a plastic bag. It keeps my food cool all day. It's lightweight so doesn't make the tote feel too heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Steph H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bottle transport
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for a single bottle holder to make sure the milk stays cold. The small size fits perfectly into the bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Molly A Fermanich

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold
customer_reviews.text: Ice pack is small and slim perfect for a baby bottle bag fits between 2 bottles. Keeps dink’s cold for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: marimor11

customer_reviews.title: Small but very effective so they fit nicely in lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Small but very effective so they fit nicely in lunch bag. Also they don’t sweat all over everything and are still cold at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fresh wet food for kitty -- even when I can't be home to provide.
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! Will probably buy a couple more sets rather than the specialty molded ones that comes with the cat feeder.
customer_reviews.author: bgd6

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking after 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: After using for 1 week, one of the ice packs started leaking and I had to throw it away. The other 2 are still okay. Overall, I do appreciate the small and flat size for my cat's automatic feeder.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Use all three in my lunch box daily
customer_reviews.text: Use them every day. They have not deformed or swollen like other packs usually do. They can be used individually or snapped together. Good for about 6 hours in a well insulated smaller container.
customer_reviews.author: Big guy 5XLT

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot smaller than the picture perceives them to be in my opinion. They keep the cold decent enough. They would last okay until a lunch period but not for an all day event.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems good but I had to return it because it arrived damaged and the liquid was missing from the pack
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great ice packs
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve bought these sooner. They do a great job of keeping specific containers cold.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: they really are small but perfect when combined with one of the larger ones. i.e I have one bag that cant fit two larger ones but needs just that little bit extra cooling and these ones fit the bottom or the top of my bag just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: Small which is in description but not enough to keep cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE, THEY WORK GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love using these in my child's lunch and snack bags. I use them with the LunchBlox container filled his favorite fruits or cheeses or yogurts and it keeps it cold all through snack and lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cano

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needed for lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily in my child's lunchbox. They are just the right size to add a layer of cold but not take up all the space needed for the actual food and drink.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Virginia Mom

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I anticipated but they do the job okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: Stay cold and are still slushy after 5 hours in a lunchbox without refrigeration. 3 fit in a lunchbox easily.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: These are good for using with additional ice packs
customer_reviews.text: These are good for using with additional ice packs. But I noticed they lose their cooling power right around the 4 hour mark.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my kids lunch box and not take up all of the space where it’s not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pinto

customer_reviews.title: works with their modular lunch box stuff
customer_reviews.text: excellent size and stack able. works with their modular lunch box stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping your food cold in your lunch box. Love their size and that they stay cold so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It freezes and gets cold. Not sure what else one would​ expect an ice pack to do.
customer_reviews.author: SaoirseMT

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are working out great for school lunches. These are nice and slim and was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Melly C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for lunch but lacks in keeping it cold for long.,
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a lunch box but they really don’t keep it cold for as long as I’d like! Their small size limits their ability to maintain their cold capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected. They are smaller than the typical ice packs but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for for my kids school lunches!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt476

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: They are TINY!!! Probably keep one carrot cold in a lunch box. :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, i will recommend it to a friend or family member
customer_reviews.author: carmen kay

customer_reviews.title: Came home in lunch box after all day school and were still pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize these were for the small 2 cell sized containers rather than the four cell size. Came home in lunch box after all day school and were still pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small snack box. Stay cold for about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: craig swensen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it was. I wanted the sandwich size.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Humplik

customer_reviews.title: Barely got cold and only stay slightly cold for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely got cold and only stay slightly cold for a couple hours. I wanted these to keep breast milk cold in our diaper bag cooler, ended up having to throw milk away because it got too warm
customer_reviews.author: sam

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid LunchBlox Ice Pack, Small, Blue, 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Snapping directly to LunchBlox containers, Blue Ice packs keep contents chilled and fresher longer. Durable, re-freezable and re-usable, these freezer packs are made of non-toxic, BPA-free plastic in the USA.
feature_bullets: Durable, re-freezable, and re-usable ice pack
Snaps directly to LunchBlox food storage containers to keep contents cool and fresher longer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars371 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
